description:
The ALGS Championship (Apex Legends Global Series 2026 Championship) is scheduled to take place from January 15-18, 2026, in Sapporo, Japan. 

This market will resolve according to which teams advance to the Finals of the Apex Legends Global Series 2026 Championship.

If the listed team officially advances to the 20-team Match Point Finals, the market will resolve to "Yes." Otherwise, it will resolve to "No." 

Ties in standings will be broken according to the official ALGS rules. 

If the 2026 ALGS Championship is canceled, postponed indefinitely, or if the official list of Finals participants is not published before January 31, 2026, this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ALGS website (https://algs.ea.com/year-5/champs-2026). A consensus of credible reporting (e.g., Liquipedia at https://liquipedia.net/apexlegends/Apex_Legends_Global_Series/2026/Championship) may also be used.

events.title: Apex Legends GS 2026 Championship: Which teams will advance to the Finals?

question: Will Ninjas in Pyjamas advance to the match point finals?
